website_summaries.verdict: The Mizuno Wave Creation Waveknit 2 is a neutral running shoe that is suitable for runners with neutral gaits or those who do not overpronate. It is built with advanced features, which include excellent cushioning and foot-hugging fit. It is a good choice for runners and athletes seeking a comfortable, durable, and supportive running companion.
pros: Some users said that the Mizuno Wave Creation Waveknit 2 is comfortable
This shoe is supportive, according to a few commenters
The excellent cushioning received praise from several wearers
It is perfect for jogging and workouts, a couple of consumers observed
Many purchasers appreciated the stylish design of the shoe
cons: A few testers experienced footsore while running in a pair of Wave Creation Waveknit 2
This shoe is heavy, some buyers complained

customer_reviews.title: Why so heavy
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavy. I researched and saw they were 13+ oz but lots of reviews said they were comfortable. Well they weren’t at all. I didn’t run in them. I wore them for a day around the house, they were so tight and heavy. I didn’t feel the normal cloud like cushion on my feet as I walked. I will say I love Mizuno running shoes and have worn them for years. These just were no good, so had to return them. Went out and bought my normal waveriders and they are great. Not against Mizuno at all just these shoes, hence the three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stiroe

customer_reviews.title: Like running on clouds!
customer_reviews.text: These running shoes are superior. I enjoy running outdoors but worry about the effects on my knees and ankles. The reduced impact these shoes provide is amazing...like jogging on clouds. And they're very comfortable. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Luna

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had them long but I’m very pleased with the fit and comfort of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: FitMom

customer_reviews.title: When ordering Mizuno shoes order a half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Mizuno running shoes for 25 years, they are very durable and the most comfortable shoe out there. The only thing I would advise is that you order a half size larger. Mizunos run small for some reason. Especially if your a runner, remember your feet swell from jogging. I also noticed that I cant wear these for to long since they are a sock like fit. My feet start hurting and throbbing in the upper ankle area after wearing a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just got my first pair of WaveKnit 3’s as I am usually a Wave Rider user over the past 5 years. Run usually 20-26 miles a week and I am finding them to be an excellent shoe. Definitely feel more absorption in the heels. Do agree that getting an extra 1/2 upward would helps with comfort. Wish there were more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: So far extremely comfortable. But this kinda money they should
customer_reviews.author: marshal501

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno scores again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Mizuno for 10 years and this pair is no exception to great comfort! I run a minimum of 10K 3 to 4 times a week. Order half over your normal shoe size for maximum comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Lariviere

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best shoes money can buy. No more pain in my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason king

customer_reviews.title: Fake shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have real doubt about authenticity of these Mizunos. The box they arrived in along with very limited logos on shoes. Have worn this brand shoe running 10 miles a week. These new fake shoes blistered up my feet. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J

customer_reviews.title: As a nurse, this is a great work shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Very comfortable, and good support. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tickacat

customer_reviews.title: Sole ripping off after one month
customer_reviews.text: I’d loved these shoes but I’m not sure why they would rip in the same spot on both shoes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Headley

customer_reviews.title: From ASICS to Mizuno
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortable. I am on my feet all day at work and at the end of the day my feet are happy.
customer_reviews.author: dennis jones

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Creation Waveknit 2 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Creation WAVEKNIT™ 2 comes packed with premium features: WAVEKNIT™ construction for a natural, foot-hugging fit, luxurious cushioning from heel to toe, and stable SmoothRide technology. Together, they give you an exceptionally comfortable running experience.
feature_bullets: WAVEKNIT upper construction provides a comfortable fit with a natural movement
SmoothRide: Creates a smooth transition from heel to toe on every step.
U4icX Midsole: A lighter, more cushioned iteration of U4ic, delivering a softer underfoot feeling for a smooth transition. Found in the Wave Enigma, Wave Inspire, Wave Rider, and Wave Prophecy.
